The video was published on Facebook on M: 2020, and has been viewed more than 1,200 times.
The video appears to be security camera: 23 am on March 20, 2020. It shows a man putting his hands inside his shorts before pressing the buttons in the lift.
The video: s caption in traditional Chinese translates to English as "Kai Tak Garden, there's a man with sexually transmitted diseases exposing his genital organ and carrying bacteria." Kai Tak Garden is a residential housing complex in Hong Kong.
A news report from a Singapore: based newspaper, The Thaiger, published on March 21, 2020, confirms a similar incident in Bangkok, where a man was arrested for deliberately contaminating an elevator with his saliva and sweat. The report includes a video showing the misleading footage.
